name: story-time
description: Kids Story Generator - A production-grade web application for generating customized children's stories

scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:catalog" "npm run dev:character" "npm run dev:story"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: npm run build:go-services && npm run build:python-workers
scripts.build:go-services: cd apps/auth-service && go build -o ../../bin/auth-service . && cd ../catalog-service && go build -o ../../bin/catalog-service . && cd ../character-service && go build -o ../../bin/character-service . && cd ../story-service && go build -o ../../bin/story-service .
scripts.build:python-workers: cd apps/text-worker && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../image-worker && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:services
scripts.test:services: npm run test:go && npm run test:python
scripts.test:go: cd apps/auth-service && go test ./... && cd ../catalog-service && go test ./... && cd ../character-service && go test ./... && cd ../story-service && go test ./...
scripts.test:python: cd apps/text-worker && python -m pytest && cd ../image-worker && python -m pytest
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:go
scripts.lint:go: cd apps/auth-service && golangci-lint run && cd ../catalog-service && golangci-lint run && cd ../character-service && golangci-lint run && cd ../story-service && golangci-lint run

author: Fares Harrazi
